settings.text:
Since inception in 2013 Pure Ground Ingredients is solely focused on organic ingredients. 

The commitment to offer exclusively organic ingredients to is a reflection of our commitment to the highest standards of healthy products as well as their social and ecological impact.

We value our network of trusted producers worldwide were many hands, from farmers in co-ops to larger companies work together to further the benefits of organic agriculture and lifestyle.

The organic integrity is central to our products. In addition to local and regional control and certification, we perform multi spectrum pesticide residue testing on all materials we purchase.

All ingredients are certified NOP organic by CCOP with additional endorsements for EU/UK, JAS, Taiwan + US/Canada equivalents.

In addition to 100% Organic, all of our ingredients are also Kosher and Halal certified.

For every lot you purchase, you will receive a Certificate of Analysis – COA – stating your ingredient’s plant name, part + origin; cut size; manufacture + expiration dates as well as microbiological, Heavy Metal and Pesticide analytical results.  Our team will match any additional testing you require.
